Name: ticketpm
Author: FlashModz
StartupCommand: npm i rimraf;npm install;npm_config_yes=true npx prisma db push;npm run build;node ${MAIN_FILE}
InstallScript:
apt update
apt install -y git nodejs npm
echo -e "Hello and Welcome!"
echo -e "NodeJS is now installing..."

apt update && apt upgrade -y
echo -e "updating npm. please wait..."
npm_config_yes=true npm install npm@latest --location=global --force

mkdir -p /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server
git clone https://github.com/Sayrix/ticket-bot && mv ./ticket-bot/* ./
cp ./config/config.example.jsonc ./config/config.jsonc
touch .env
{
        echo '  # Your discord token'
        echo '  TOKEN=""'
        echo '  # Prisma Database URL (refer to docs https://doc.ticket.pm/docs/prisma)'
        echo '  DATABASE_URL="file:./tixbot.db"'
} >> .env

echo "Installing nodejs packages"

npm_config_yes=true npx prisma db push
npm run build -y
echo -e "NodeJS is now ready"
exit 0

Variables.Description: Please insert your Discord Bot Token
Do not change, only if you use external DB, please follow (https://doc.ticket.pm/docs/prisma)
